# contentSource | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ AVFAudio ](/documentation/avfaudio)

-  contentSource 

Instance Property# contentSource

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
var contentSource: AVAudioContentSource { get set }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioConverter/contentSource#discussion)

Index to select a pre-defined content source type that describes the content type and how it was generated. Note: This is only supported when compressing audio to formats which support it.
